title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins
created_time: October 26, 2023, 03:55:46 PMLast edit: December 07, 2023, 09:53:59 PM by mx12.levins
content: Video of my AR(Augmented Reality) Layer for this physical artwork viewable here:coming soon!(The full Transmutation NFT animation with audio can be viewed as an Augmented Reality layer over the physical artwork with the free Artivive app.)links with video here: Soon!if the price ticker is not loading then update the link BTC= + (US 50$ Shipping ) + (EU 15$ Shipping)AUCTIONED https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5476969.0Physical artwork in size 100 x 100 cmCollectors Edition 1 of 1BITCOIN RADIANCE!1. - “BITCOIN RADIANCE!” --- SOLDEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.LevinsPayment:Payment address Bitcoin: 3CDxDhHppj1Vyjfb771WjUNiS28UvR5EZyPayment address Bitcoin Lightning: nastyrisk78@walletofsatoshi.comBITCOIN RADIANCE!Explore the enigmatic beauty of “Bitcoin Radiance,” a mesmerizing acrylic painting that measures 100cm x 100cm. This unique artwork was skillfully crafted using a palette knife technique, resulting in a textured and captivating masterpiece that draws you in.Inspired by the electric atmosphere of the last conference in London, “Bitcoin Radiance” is a one-of-a-kind creation that encapsulates the spirit of innovation and the mystique of cryptocurrency. The painting features a central motif of a skull, symbolizing the intrigue and complexity surrounding the crypto world. A subtle moon hovers in the background, casting an ethereal glow, while above, a shimmering shift occurs as a vibrant Bitcoin sun emerges to illuminate the path forward.This artwork is a singular creation, 1 of 1, making it an exclusive addition to your collection. Along with its aesthetic allure, “Bitcoin Radiance” comes with several benefits and certificates, attesting to its originality and quality.Embrace the mystery and radiance of the crypto universe with “Bitcoin Radiance,” a masterpiece that invites you to explore the depths of this transformative world. It’s not just an artwork; it’s a journey, a story, and a testament to the ever-evolving landscape of digital currency_____________________________Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: If you're interested in adding this masterpiece to your space, feel free to DM me. Don't miss out on the chance to own a truly original work of art!

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: SOLDThis was an interesting way to do it, I sold the artwork to a Bitcoin community member who also won the 'Bitcoin Pizza Day 2022' lottery. He got the ticket from MoparMining, the one who made this whole thing possible, including the lucky number  . It's crazy how sometimes things just fall into place. Congratulations to the collector!I still have some 1 of 1 artworks available, although they aren't that large in size. However, a new one is on the way and will be unveiled at the next private exhibition in London on August 19-21. This particular artwork holds a certain power, and I can't wait to share it with you.As a fun twist, we have an International Chess Master as a guest at the summit(https://www.domainsummit.com/e/2138615980) The person who wins against this master will receive the original artwork. If nobody beats him, the artwork will be gifted to the master, and, of course, I'll make also an open edition for those who try to beat him. I don't want anyone to leave empty handed. It takes a lot of effort, but these kinds of art exhibitions should be fun, right?
